meanings.definition: A small unit or division of the retina in the eye.
meanings.sent1: The retinulas in the eye help us see different colors.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the retinulas to understand how vision works.
meanings.sent3: The retinulas in my eye must be working overtime today!
meanings.sent4: Her artistic talent was like retinulas, capturing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The retinulas are like tiny puzzle pieces forming our vision.

meanings.sent1: I counted the retinulas in the microscope slide.
meanings.sent2: The retinulas under the lens looked like tiny dots.
meanings.sent3: The retinulas on the screen seemed to dance around.
meanings.sent4: The retinulas in the image resembled a starry night sky.
meanings.sent5: Each of the retinulas played a crucial role in vision.
